item.title: Kartarpur Corridor - Will it ease tensions between the two countries or will it be a passage for separatist activities in Punjab?
item.description: The Kartarpur corridor would be inaugurated by the Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday, 9th November. India is quite aware of the Pakistanâ€™s motive on Kartarpur corridor.

item.title: Some good news coming from across the border in respect to Kartarpur Corridor
item.description: The Chief Minister of Punjab, Captain Amarinder Singh has extended an invitation to the former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh and present Prime Minister Narendra Modi to attend 550th birth anniversary of Guru Nanak, the founder of Sikhism next month.
